matches.regexp:
(?-mix:<!--
	This OnlineStore is brought to you by XT-Commerce, Community made shopping
	XTC is a free open source e-Commerce System
	created by Mario Zanier & Guido Winger and licensed under GNU/GPL.
	Information and contribution at http://www.xt-commerce.com
-->)

matches.version: (?-mix:<meta name="generator" content="\(c\) by xt:Commerce v([^,]{1,15}) , http:\/\/www.xt-commerce.com" \/>)

matches.module: (?-mix:<meta name="generator" content="\(c\) by (xtcModified v[\d\.]{1,15}) dated: [\d]{4}-[\d]{2}-[\d]{2} , http:\/\/www.xtc-modified.org" \/>)

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div class="copyright"><a rel="follow" href="http:\/\/[^>^"]*\/ecombase.php" title="eComBASE licence">eComBASE<\/a> © [\d]{4} based on )
